EmailTemplate.name: Notifying Mentor On Feedback Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: Performance: Performance Feedback For {!PM_Configure__c.Mentee__c} Submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PM_Configure__c.Mentor__c},
We hope this message finds you well. This is to inform you that the performance feedback for {!PM_Configure__c.Mentee__c} under the Project {!PM_Configure__c.Project_Name__c} is submitted by {!PM_Configure__c.Reporting_Contact__c} as requested.
Best Regards,
Cloud Peritus Team
